title: Healing Touch - Fresh Start Women's Foundation
description: Learn some of the basic techniques and terminology used in healing touch and how you can use these in your daily life.
cleaned_text: Gentle touch assists in balancing physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual well-being. It assists in creating a coherent and balanced energy field. It is safe for all ages and works in harmony with standard medical care. Each session is 45 mins. Sign up for an open slot below. Available dates:
